content: a simple pair of crochet hikes that slide onto your belt and lift up your hemline these are great for lifting up a skirt or dress for decoration keep off the ground to show off another layer underneath or to help make walking a bit easier this pattern has two different versions but they are quite basic and easily customisable and the button is just for decoration/reinforcement no buttonholes to be made here o you will need two rings or suspender clips for each hike a full list of materials can be found in the pattern as well as in the description of the tutorial linked below - a video tutorial for how to crochet this pattern as well as make leather versions can be found here https //youtu be/fvilah0-fxq
